'''Bait Resupply Plan''' is a [[World Quest]] during the [[Lunar Realm]] event. This quest will automatically trigger each time the player runs out of [[Glowgrass Bait]].

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You're out of Glowgrass Bait. Time to find Kujirai Momiji to make some more...}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Kujirai Momiji)

:{{DIcon|Quest}} I ran out of Glowgrass Bait.
:'''Kujirai Momiji:''' Huh? Good thing you brought enough materials last time, I made some spares.
:'''Kujirai Momiji:''' Come on, take these. If you run out again, you know where to find me.
{{Dialogue end}}
